value.0:
Its alright I'm a friend. 
A... cousin, really.
And I'm here to help you last out the night.  Just keep breathing slowly and try to calm down. Do know what has happened or do you need me to explain it?
Oh, that is very good... Makes my job easier. Now then what were you before your change...

What form were you born in? See we all have a breed we were born in. It is kind of important to know which form you come from before we move on to other things. Do you need me to explain them for you?

Well you could have been born Humid. Meaning you were born and raised as a human. This normally means you will have the easiest time adapting to working with humans as you are now. Then there is lupis. Means you were born a wolf, normally that means that getting around in the human world is going to be a bit confusing for you not having been raised as one but you will adapt eventually. Then there is Metis. It means you were born in a crinos form the offspring of two garou, which means that you will be looked down on in our world and have the hardest time getting around in the human world as some form of your garou crinos form shows in all your forms. So which are you? ((there is no comfirmation on selection choose carefully))
Metis born I am sorry to hear that. I shall now send you on your way to Calls-the-Moon so he may aid you in your next stage.
Ahh a Lupis born. I shall now send you on your way to Calls-the-Moon so he may aid you in your next stage.
Ahh a Humid born. I shall now send you on your way to Calls-the-Moon so he may aid you in your next stage.
Which would that be?

You might have known this was coming. Was it the dreams? Sometimes it's the dreams - dreams of running on all fours, smelling blood from miles away, the moonlight Or maybe it was the other kids. Did they treat you differently, like they could somehow see something dangerous about you? That'll happen, too. And it all got worse as you got older. Once you started getting into your teenage years, the dreams got worse, and you started to feel something bottled up inside you. The children of your youth avoided you. Maybe instructors thought you were acting funny, and the pressure inside kept building.

Yeah, I know the story. Particularly the next part. You got pushed too far. Something inside you snapped. The next thing you knew, you were covered in blood, standing in a pile of guts and flesh and bone that used to be a person - or people.
It's okay! It's okay. This time, it's okay. The people here were trying to kill you. It was you or them. You did good. You just need to learn a little more control.
No, we can't go back. Your old life's dead - and if they catch us, there's a fair chance that your new life won't last much longer. They'll probably have silver this time.
You don't know why you just shuddered when I said that, do you? Or maybe you've guessed by now?
You've just gone through your First Change.
Your a Garou now. A Werewolf.

Listen....
Thousands of years ago, before humans used language to describe the events of the past, the Earth Mother created three supernatural forces - the Weaver, the Wyrm and the Wyld - to maintain the universe. She guided all nature's creatures with a feral claw.

It was the Earth Mother, they say, who first taught us to change our shape. And it was at Her command that we fostered the fledgling human race. Many were the shapeshifting kinds, but we were the most powerful, the most feared - the Garou, the werewolves. Together, we kept the human herds in check. A conclave of our tribes ruled our kind, and we were the Earth's dominant species.

We reveled in our dominance, and we sought to command all shapeshifters. When not all would bow to our might, we claimed our kin to be a threat to Gaia's human children. In retaliation for their defiance, we waged a savage battle against our changing kind. We never expected that those we sought to protect would be the next to dissent.

The violence was so terrible that humankind turned its back on us all. While we carved out a path in blood, humans relegated us to myth and legend and began their own story. So much did humankind deny our existence that, to this day, humans who see a Garou retreat in madness and forget what they have seen.

*she gently quiets you with her hand*
Today, we Garou live under the Veil, concealing ourselves from the humans who are now dominant among Gaia's offspring. But still, be it in the world of flesh or spirit, we fight to prevent the Apocalypse. As humans pollute the world and cities grow, strangling the wild places, so too do the Wyrm and the Weaver fight each other in a conflict that can only destroy the world.
We Garou stand in their way. And you are one of those warriors.
You know our story and your breed I can teach you no more. See Calls-the-Moon now.
You know our story and your breed I can teach you no more. See Calls-the-Moon now.
You know our story and your breed I can teach you no more. See Calls-the-Moon now.
*takes deep breaths* I... know what has happened yes... Now what?
What do you mean what was I?
Yes please..
I was born Metis
I was born Lupis
I was born Humid.
No I know what breed form i was born in.
*looks confused taking deep breaths*
Wait how did you.....
I... Killed people *looks ill*
I just want to go back home and forget this ever happened.
*shudders unconsciously*
Guessed what?
First Change?
Right.
ok
That sounds pretty monstrious.
I see
Ok so now what.
